page.title: 19NEW HOUSE AT BROWN KNOWL
page.content: Planning application submitted to Chester city council,approved after two months.Work started March 1985 and completion anticipated September 1985. It is a bungalow with a basement area constructed to provide deep strong foundations in clay soil on sandstone. There is a living room 6m square with a free standing brick chimney, also a kitchen,small utility room and a bathroom designed to be either ensuite or seperate from main bedroom.There are two other bedrooms .In June a"stop"order was requested by local residents concerning roof height and use of the basement for extra living space,thus possibly contravening planning peemission.Owner continuing to build , until in receipt of official order, should it occur. {TOTAL COST}Â£35000 (materials Â£23000, labour Â£12000).{COST of PLOT}Â£15000.
